trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 控制項，其允許使用者使用視覺化月曆顯示來選取日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control allows the user to select a date using a visual display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項可讓使用者選取日期，使用的視覺顯示。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the date and times that can be selected by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制日期和時間可以藉由設定選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更尋找 控制項的行事曆部分的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項僅支援西曆。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項僅支援西曆。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control is drawn by the operating system, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint> event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>繪製控制項的作業系統，所以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint>永遠不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide a customized look to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> method, call the base implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>, and then perform custom painting.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要提供自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，您應該會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>方法呼叫的基底實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>，然後再執行自訂繪製。

trans-unit.source: If you need custom date formatting and a selection limited to just one date, you might consider using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control instead of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要自訂的日期格式設定和選取範圍限制為只有一個日期，您可以考慮使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>而不是控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> eliminates much of the need for validating date/time values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>消除許多需要驗證的日期/時間值。

trans-unit.source: For more information on month calendar controls, see [Month Calendar Control Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關月份行事曆控制項，請參閱[月份行事曆控制參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性，以變更行事曆格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>。

trans-unit.target: 下表所顯示的是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Today's date.
trans-unit.target: 今天的日期。

trans-unit.source: Today's date.
trans-unit.target: 今天的日期。

trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性，以變更行事曆格式。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 粗體顯示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day that is displayed in bold on an annual basis in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 以每年為原則將粗體顯示的某天加入月曆中。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法之後，更新顯示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在單一作業中加入多個日期，您可以指派的陣列<xref:System.DateTime>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 粗體顯示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day to be displayed in bold in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 將粗體顯示的某天加入月曆中。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法之後，更新顯示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在單一作業中加入多個日期，您可以指派的陣列<xref:System.DateTime>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AddBoldedDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> methods to mark and display in a bold font dates read from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AddBoldedDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>標示，並在從檔案讀取的日期以粗體字顯示的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, named `monthCalendar1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，名為`monthCalendar1`，已新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並放置在表單內和從它呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 粗體顯示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day that is displayed in bold on a monthly basis in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 以每月為原則將粗體顯示的某天加入月曆中。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法之後，更新顯示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在單一作業中加入多個日期，您可以指派的陣列<xref:System.DateTime>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that determines which annual days are displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的陣列，決定一年之中的哪些日期要以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you can assign an array of annual bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，您可以指派一年之中粗體日期的陣列。

trans-unit.source: When you assign an array of dates, the existing dates are first cleared.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派日期的陣列時，會先清除現有的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性，以變更行事曆格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>屬性不支援透明的色彩，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of the controls to the default system colors.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>預設系統色彩的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的任何子控制項，則程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫其本身。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例需要您具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>與至少一個子系控制項; 不過，子容器控制，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>，使用自己的子系控制項會進一步示範遞迴。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that determines which nonrecurring dates are displayed in bold.

trans-unit.target: 粗體日期的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you can assign an array of bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，來指派粗體日期的陣列。

trans-unit.source: When you assign an array of dates, the existing dates are first cleared.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派日期的陣列時，會先清除現有的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性，以變更行事曆格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns and rows of months displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所顯示月份的行數和列數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with the number of columns and rows to use to display the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，具有顯示日曆要使用的行數和列數。

trans-unit.source: Only one calendar year is displayed at a time, and the maximum number of months that can be displayed is 12.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個日曆年度會顯示一次，而且可以顯示之月份的數目上限為 12。

trans-unit.source: Valid combinations of columns and rows make a maximum product of 12; for values greater than 12, the display is modified on a best-fit basis.
trans-unit.target: 有效的資料行和資料列組合進行 12; 最大產品如需大於 12 的值，顯示會修改自動調整為基礎。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> instance.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> instance returned by this method provides correct values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name>, and <System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role> properties.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role> property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Table?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name> property is the current selection, and the new default value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help> property is the type name.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Table?displayProperty=nameWithType>，新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name>屬性是目前的選取範圍，以及新的預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help>屬性為型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is only available in applications that are recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or that opt in to the .NET Framework accessibility features added in the .NET Framework 4.7.1 by using a compatibility switch.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> ，才可以重新撰寫以.NET Framework 4.7.1 為目標，或可選擇要使用相容性參數，在.NET Framework 4.7.1 中加入的.NET Framework 協助工具功能的應用程式中使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Windows Forms section in [Retargeting Changes for Migration from .NET Framework 4.7 to 4.7.1](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

trans-unit.source: Gets the default margin settings for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 控制項的預設邊界設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> structure with a padding size of 9 pixels, for all of its edges.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 結構，其所有邊緣都有 9 個像素的邊框間距大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得日曆的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> specifying the height and width, in pixels, of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定控制項的高度和寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DefaultSize%2A> property includes the area necessary to display the "Today:" date at the bottom of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DefaultSize%2A>屬性包含要顯示所需的區域 「 今日:"底部的行事曆日期。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefWndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefWndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode
trans-unit.target: Associated enumeration: F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應使用次要緩衝區重繪其介面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control should use a secondary buffer to redraw; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項應使用次要緩衝區來進行重繪，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleBuffered%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleBuffered%2A>屬性沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick> bit flag to `false`, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> will not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick>位元旗標設為`false`，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>將不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first day of the week as displayed in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定月曆所顯示之一週的第一天。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Day.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Day.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性，以變更行事曆格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Day" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of the controls to the default system colors.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>預設系統色彩的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的任何子控制項，則程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫其本身。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例需要您具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>與至少一個子系控制項; 不過，子容器控制，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>，使用自己的子系控制項會進一步示範遞迴。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要覆寫兩個<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />存取子<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" />屬性; 您可以覆寫只能有一個必要。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to retrieve only the dates that are fully contained in displayed months; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示只擷取所顯示月份充分包含的日期，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves date information that represents the low and high limits of the displayed dates of the control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取日期資訊，表示控制項所顯示日期的高低限度。

trans-unit.source: The begin and end dates of the displayed calendar.
trans-unit.target: 顯示之日曆的開始和結束日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.GetDisplayRange%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> that contains the begin and end dates displayed in the current view of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.GetDisplayRange%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>包含控制項目前檢視中顯示的開始和結束日期。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the returned range based on the value you specify for the `visible` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改傳回根據您指定的值的範圍`visible`參數。

trans-unit.source: By specifying `false`, you can retrieve all dates displayed on the control; specifying `true` retrieves only those dates that are part of fully displayed months.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定`false`，您可以擷取顯示在控制項; 上的所有日期指定`true`擷取只屬於完整顯示月份的日期。

trans-unit.source: Determines which element of the calendar is at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 判斷日曆的哪個項目是在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> containing the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> coordinates of the point to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，包含點擊測試之點的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> 座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with information on which portion of a month calendar control is at a location specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件，其中包含月曆控制項中的哪部分資訊在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 所指定的位置上。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the specified point on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 上指定點的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> coordinate of the point to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: 要點擊測試之點的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> 座標。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> coordinate of the point to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: 要點擊測試之點的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> 座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" /> with information on which portion of a month calendar control is at a specified x- and y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" />，其中包含月曆控制項中的哪部分資訊在指定的 X 和 Y 座標上。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the specified point on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.HitTestInfo" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 上指定點的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項支援的輸入法 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.ImeMode" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.ImeMode" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個按鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定容許日期的上限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> representing the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，代表容許日期的上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 12/31/9998.
The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of days that can be selected in a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定月曆控制項中可選取的最多天數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of days that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選取的最多天數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 7.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 7。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not effect the current selection range.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性不會影響目前的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: It is important to remember that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請務必記住<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性表示選取範圍，之間的差異中的天數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>為 7 （預設）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>可以是不超過 6 天距離。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the edges of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> control and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" /> 控制項的邊緣和其內容之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Padding%2A> property will have no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Padding%2A>屬性不會影響的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Padding" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Padding" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 發生於重繪控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.UserPaint> bit flag to `false`, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> will not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.UserPaint>位元旗標設為`false`，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>將不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: To provide a custom look to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> method, call the base implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>, and then perform custom painting.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，您應該會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>方法呼叫的基底實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>，然後再執行自訂繪製。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the annually bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有的一年中粗體的日期。

trans-unit.source: This method clears all dates from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A> array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會清除所有日期之<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>陣列。

trans-unit.source: To remove a single date from the bold dates, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveAnnuallyBoldedDate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的粗體日期的單一日期，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveAnnuallyBoldedDate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法，以確保顯示已更新來反映移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the nonrecurring bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有非週期性粗體日期。

trans-unit.source: This method clears the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>陣列。

trans-unit.source: To remove a single date from the bold dates, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveBoldedDate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的粗體日期的單一日期，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveBoldedDate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法，以確保顯示已更新來反映移除。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveAllBoldedDates%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveAllBoldedDates%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the monthly bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有的每月粗體日期。

trans-unit.source: This method clears the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>陣列。

trans-unit.source: To remove a single date from the bold dates, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveMonthlyBoldedDate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的粗體日期的單一日期，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveMonthlyBoldedDate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法，以確保顯示已更新來反映移除。

trans-unit.source: The date to remove from the date list.
trans-unit.target: 要從日期清單中移除的日期。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified date from the list of annually bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 從一年之中粗體日期的清單中移除指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date occurs more than once in the date list, only the first date is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期發生在 [日期] 清單中的一次以上，會移除第一次的日期。

trans-unit.source: When comparing dates, only the day and month are used.
trans-unit.target: 比較日期時，會使用僅的日期和月份。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法，以確保顯示已更新來反映移除。

trans-unit.source: The date to remove from the date list.
trans-unit.target: 要從日期清單中移除的日期。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified date from the list of nonrecurring bold dates.
trans-unit.target: 從非週期性粗體日期清單中移除指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date occurs more than once in the date list, only the first date is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期發生在 [日期] 清單中的一次以上，會移除第一次的日期。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法，以確保顯示已更新來反映移除。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RemoveBoldedDate%2A>方法的粗體日期清單中移除指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, named `monthCalendar1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，名為`monthCalendar1`，已新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並放置在表單內和從它呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The date to remove from the date list.
trans-unit.target: 要從日期清單中移除的日期。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified date from the list of monthly bolded dates.
trans-unit.target: 從每月粗體日期清單中移除指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date occurs more than once in the date list, only the first date is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期發生在 [日期] 清單中的一次以上，會移除第一次的日期。

trans-unit.source: When comparing dates, only the day and month are used.
trans-unit.target: 比較日期時，會使用僅的日期和月份。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> to ensure that the display is updated to reflect the removal.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>以確保顯示已更新來反映移除。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value prior to the change.
trans-unit.target: 變更之前的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value after the change.
trans-unit.target: 變更之後的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: Provides constants for rescaling the control when a DPI change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 提供在發生 DPI 變更時用來重新調整控制項的常數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否由右至左配置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is laid out from right to left; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項由右至左配置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is useful for international applications where the language is written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A>屬性可用於國際應用程式的語言由右至左的寫入位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> properties are both `true`,
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout%2A>屬性都`true`，

trans-unit.source: Mirroring will be turned on for the form, and control placement and text will be from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 鏡像將會開啟表單中，而且控制項位置和文字會從右至左。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayout" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> named `MonthCalendar1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>名為`MonthCalendar1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scroll rate for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定月曆控制項的捲動速率。

trans-unit.source: A positive number representing the current scroll rate in number of months moved.
trans-unit.target: 正數，表示目前的捲動速率，以移動的月數為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default is the number of months currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前顯示的月數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum is 20,000.
The scroll rate is the number of months that the control moves its display when the user clicks a scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: 捲動速率是當使用者按一下捲動箭號，控制項移動顯示的月數。

trans-unit.source: If this value is 0, the number of months is reset to the default, which is the number of months displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值為 0，而不是控制項中顯示的月數預設會重設的月數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value is 20,000.
The following code example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bold.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> properties to change the calendar format.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性，以變更行事曆格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value is greater than 20,000.
Gets or sets the end date of the selected range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取範圍日期的結束日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> indicating the last date in the selection range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，代表選取範圍的最後一個日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property to a date that is earlier than the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is automatically set equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性早於目前的值為日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>自動設為等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you set a date in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> that causes the selection to exceed the number of days specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is adjusted; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is automatically set so that the number of days selected is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>，讓選取範圍超過所指定的天數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性、 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>會調整。<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>會自動設定的天數選取等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> 表示選取範圍，之間的差異中的天數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>是 7 （預設值），則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>可以是不超過 6 天距離。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>啟用視覺化樣式的控制項將會導致不正確地繪製在控制項上的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control named `MonthCalendar1`, and call the `ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，名為`MonthCalendar1`，並呼叫`ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: The date value is less than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 日期的值小於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The date value is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 日期的值大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected range of dates for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定月曆控制項的日期選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> with the start and end dates of the selected range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />，具有選取範圍的開始和結束日期。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is functionally equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性是在功能上相當於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以分別設定開始和結束日期，藉由設定 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the start and end dates by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更開始和結束日期，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You should use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> is greater than its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property value, the dates are swapped; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property value becomes the starting date, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property value becomes the end date.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>大於其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值，就會交換日期;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值就是開始日期，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>屬性值變成結束日期。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved).
trans-unit.target: 捲動瀏覽按鈕的行事曆顯示選取範圍時，可能會導致非預期的結果 （例如，日期不會保留範圍）。

trans-unit.source: If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar to March changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有各種 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001年顯示單一月份，捲動年 3 月的行事曆會選取的範圍變更，如下所示： 03/01/2001 到 03/10/2001年。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有數個月顯示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月 04/01/2001 04/10/2001，來選取範圍回到一月和二月日曆捲動會選取的範圍變更，如下所示： 01/01/2001 至 01/10/2001年。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>啟用視覺化樣式的控制項將會導致不正確地繪製在控制項上的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> value of the assigned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> is less than the minimum date allowable for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 指派之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> 值小於月曆控制項的容許日期下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> value of the assigned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> is greater than the maximum allowable date for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 指派之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> 值大於月曆控制項的容許日期上限。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End" /> value of the assigned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> is less than the minimum date allowable for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 指派之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> 值小於月曆控制項的容許日期下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End" /> value of the assigned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> is greater than the maximum allowable date for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 指派之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> 值大於月曆控制項的容許日期上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start date of the selected range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取範圍日期的開始日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> indicating the first date in the selection range.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示選取範圍的第一個日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> property to a date that is later than the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is automatically set equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>晚於目前的值為日期屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>自動設為等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you set a date in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> that causes the selection to exceed the number of days specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is adjusted; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is automatically set so that the number of days selected is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>，讓選取範圍超過所指定的天數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>屬性、 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>會調整。<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>會自動設定的天數選取等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> 表示選取範圍，之間的差異中的天數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>是 7 （預設值），則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>可以是不超過 6 天距離。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>啟用視覺化樣式的控制項將會導致不正確地繪製在控制項上的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control named `MonthCalendar1`, and call the `ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，名為`MonthCalendar1`，並呼叫`ShowAWeeksVacationOneMonthFromToday`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: The date value is less than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" />.
trans-unit.target: 日期值小於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The date value is greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" />.
trans-unit.target: 日期值大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right" /> 屬性值。
